definition: Lyon, French city on the Rhône

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
to lift/to raise/to raise one's head/high/high spirits/soaring/expensive

sentences.english: Lyon claim that Chelsea's attempts to sign midfielder Michael Essien have all but collapsed.
sentences.chinese: 里昂宣称切尔西试图签下中场埃辛的事情以失败告终。

sentences.english: Glion has been the very origin of my journey.
sentences.chinese: 格里昂是我工作历程的开端。

sentences.english: Portsmouth are in the frame for Olympique Lyon attacker Sidney Govou.
sentences.chinese: 朴茨茅斯正在追逐里昂前锋戈武。

sentences.english: He will travel to Lyon and we will see.
sentences.chinese: 他会去里昂，到时看情况而定。

sentences.english: Marseilles is a chief port and Lyon is an industrial center famous for its textiles.
sentences.chinese: 马赛是最大的港口，而里昂则以纺织工业著称于世。

sentences.english: Marion’s friendships were as legendary as her scripts.
sentences.chinese: 马里昂的友情跟她的剧本一样传奇。

sentences.english: Marion uses the screen to curl to the elbow and wait for the ball.
sentences.chinese: 马里昂利用掩护卷切到牛角区等球。

sentences.english: Freon could be used over and over again.
sentences.chinese: 这样，氟里昂可以被反复不断地使用。

sentences.english: Fernando was injured against Lorient out will be out for several weeks.
sentences.chinese: 费尔南多在和洛里昂的比赛中受伤，可能要缺阵几周。

sentences.english: I am Kryon of Magnetic Service.
sentences.chinese: 我是磁力服务的克里昂。

sentences.english: Thousands of women die each year from complications related to pregnancy and childbirth in Sierra Leone.
sentences.chinese: 在塞拉里昂，每年有数以千计的孕妇及产妇离逝。

sentences.english: Lion is Mrs Lee's cat, catching the mouse.
sentences.chinese: 里昂是李太太的毛，正在抓老鼠。

sentences.english: Marion Nestle, a high-profile professor of nutrition at New York University, agrees.
sentences.chinese: 马里昂雀巢的营养高调纽约大学教授对此表示赞同。
飞往里昂的160航班在4号门登机。

definition: Marseille, city in south France/Basay, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan
